org.pepstock.charba.client.options

Class ScaledOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.NativeObjectContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.AbstractModel<Options,IsDefaultOptions>
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.Options
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.options.ScaledOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultOptions, IsDefaultScaledOptions
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChartOptions, ExtendedOptions, OptionsNode

    public class ScaledOptions
extends Options
implements IsDefaultScaledOptions
    Base object which maps chart options, with scales elements to set axes configurations.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

      • ScaledOptions

        protected ScaledOptions(IsDefaultScaledOptions defaultValues)
        Creates the object only with default provider. This is used as the root element.
        New native java script object is created and it's empty.
        Parameters:
        defaultValues - default provider instance.

      • ScaledOptions

        protected ScaledOptions(IsDefaultScaledOptions defaultValues,
                        NativeObject nativeObject)
        Creates the object only with default provider and native object. This is used as the root element.
        Parameters:
        defaultValues - default provider instance.
        nativeObject - native object to store properties.
